subject: fix: correct border colors and destructive action colors throughout app
body:
Problem:
- Borders throughout app used border-primary/XX (blue tint) instead of
  neutral gray border colors
- "End Chat" destructive action used bg-secondary (magenta) instead of
  semantic error (red)
- Error messages used bg-secondary/20 instead of bg-errorBg
- Chat background pattern at 4% opacity was too subtle to be visible

Solution:
- Replace all border-primary/XX, border-secondary/XX, border-accent/XX
  with neutral border (#404040) or borderDark (#505050)
- Change "End Chat" button from bg-secondary/90 to bg-error/90 (red)
- Change error message styling from secondary to error colors
- Increase chat background pattern opacity from 4% to 8%

Preserved intentional color usage:
- Reply bars: border-l-4 border-primary for visual accent
- Reaction badges: bg-primary border-primary when user has reacted
- Action buttons: bg-primary, bg-secondary, bg-accent for themed actions
- Link text: text-primary for clickable links
- Status badges: bg-secondary/30 for "Waiting..." indicators

Impact:
- Borders now appear as neutral dark gray instead of blue-tinted
- Destructive actions use red (error) color for clearer intent
- Error messages visually distinct with red backgrounds
- Chat background pattern more visible
- Theme accent colors reserved for intentional usage only
title: correct border colors and destructive action colors throughout app
